sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder } from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { resValue: number = 0; // Initialize as a number fromCurrency: number = 1; // Initialize with a default value toCurrency: number = 1; // Initialize with a default value amount: number = 0; // Initialize as a number constructor(public fb: FormBuilder) { } CurrencyForm = this.fb.group({ fromCurrency: [this.fromCurrency], amount: [this.amount], toCurrency: [this.toCurrency] }) onSubmitt() { this.amount = this.CurrencyForm.get('amount').value; this.fromCurrency = parseFloat(this.CurrencyForm.get('fromCurrency').value); // Parse as a float this.toCurrency = parseFloat(this.CurrencyForm.get('toCurrency').value); // Parse as a float this.resValue = (this.toCurrency / this.fromCurrency) * this.amount; this.resValue = Math.round(this.resValue * 100) / 100; // Round to two decimal places } }
